qas.question: Who describes an experiment with swallows?
Where did this experiment take place?

answers.text: they remained warm and dry through the winters

qas.question: How long did the birds stay alive?

context: <a0_0>Bewick<a0_0/> then describes an experiment which succeeded in keeping swallows alive in <a1_0>Britain<a1_0/> for <a3_0>several years<a3_0/>, where <a2_0>they remained warm and dry through the winters<a2_0/>. He concludes:
